// Generated by style-generator, be careful when editing this file

const opaque: unique symbol = Symbol();

export interface CssClass {
  readonly _opaque: typeof opaque
  readonly _value: string
}

const buildCssClass = (className: string): CssClass => ({
  _opaque: opaque,
  _value: className,
});

export const join = (classNames: CssClass[]): string => (
  classNames.map(({ _value }) => _value).join(" ")
);

{% for class in classes %}
export const {{class|name}}: CssClass = buildCssClass("{{class}}");
{% endfor %}
